wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi, everyone. Today we start with news from the IMF about their report on slowing economic growth. A $40 million settlement has Merill Lynch paying back clients over bad practices. Check out some key insights about the Roth 401(k) and why you should be evaluating one for yourself. And when you think of what it is to be a kid, playtime is a big part of that notion. But in the digital age, that might be threatened. So, see how parents are fighting back against excessive screentime. And for some daily inspiration, check out these 37 Disney quotes.

ECONOMY

IMF lowers its global economic growth forecast again as risks remain to the ‘downside’

The International Monetary Fund trimmed its forecast for global economic growth again as the U.S.-China trade war continues, Brexit worries linger and inflation remains muted.

 

INVESTMENT

Merrill Lynch pays $40 million settlement over broker churning, faces second claim for $42 million

Merrill Lynch last month paid a stunning $40 million settlement to a customer who alleged his broker churned his account and is facing a similar claim for $42 million from another customer who had the same broker.

 

RETIREMENT

The best way to save for retirement may include this underused plan

About 7 in 10 companies offer a Roth 401(k) option that lets workers contribute after-tax dollars, which can then be withdrawn tax-free in retirement.

 

TECHNOLOGY

For Kids, Free Time Equals Screen Time—So Parents Fight Back

In the digital age, a backlash against unstructured play has families making lists of 100 things to do offline

 

PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT

37 Disney Quotes That Will Inspire You to Remarkable Success

As Disneyland kicks off festivities in the run up to its 60th anniversary on July 17, I thought it would be a good time to remember some of the inspiring words of Disney film characters (and Walt Disney himself) over the years.
